-- | Postmark snaplet for the Snap Framework
--   
@package snaplet-postmark
@version 0.2.0

module Snap.Snaplet.Postmark
newtype Postmark
Postmark :: PostmarkSettings -> Postmark
unPostmark :: Postmark -> PostmarkSettings
class (MonadIO m, Functor m) => HasPostmark m
getPostmark :: HasPostmark m => m Postmark
logErr :: MonadIO m => t -> IO (Maybe a) -> WriterT [t] m (Maybe a)
initPostmark :: SnapletInit b Postmark
withPS :: HasPostmark m => (PostmarkSettings -> m a) -> m a
sendEmail :: HasPostmark m => Email -> m (PostmarkResponse PostmarkError Sent)
sendEmails :: HasPostmark m => [Email] -> m (PostmarkResponse PostmarkError [Sent])
instance Show Postmark
instance HasPostmark (Handler b Postmark)
